BookingSystemFacade
public class BookingSystemFacadeImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements BookingSystemFacade

An implementation of BookingSystemFacade which uses ContractorModel to retrieve and update contractors information.

findContractors

public java.util.Set<Contractor> findContractors(java.lang.String name,
                                                 java.lang.String location,
                                                 boolean matchBoth)
                                          throws FindException
Description copied from interface: BookingSystemFacade
Finds contractors according to name and location.

Specified by:
findContractors in interface BookingSystemFacade
Parameters:
name - name to match with.
location - location to match with.
matchBoth - if true records returned must match the name and location, otherwise, records must match name or location.
Returns:
list of contractors matching passed criteria.
Throws:
FindException - if finding for contractors is failed.

Throws:
BookingException - if booking is failed or was already booked.
